data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naama nui, nii é daazu ma ga bala nui ná-fai!
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa makɛ, é zɛnvui wo,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa yeeyɛ ba, a ɠɛna laani betei zu taɓai ba.
Gè ɠɛni ma: «Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, màawɔinɠa!
Wɔ̀inzeɠe nuiti ta ɓɔɛzu dàalɔɠɔma ga ɲɔuɗa,
Ni nui ta a ʋaana é wɛlɛ bà,
Niiti kpein ti wɔ̀inzeɠezu, ta ɓɔɛzu laa wu ɓɔɠɔ zaama ga ze,
«Niima zeeɓɛi é sogai, faa ɲɔu wola ɠa!
Anɛɛ bɔ̀ɔla ʋagɔi nii gè laani da,
Kɛlɛ ɗɔun ɗa, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, màawɔinɠa, è ʋa è bùzeɠe,
Wɛlɛ, nii gè kwɛɛgai la ga è wɔinʋɛ ga ze,
